title: MINOR: Stack trace when eth1 node has not finished syncing yet
body:
# üêû Bug Report

## Description

I observe a mildly-alarming (but gracefully-handled) stack trace when running `beacon-chain` with `--http-web3provider` as a geth instance which is still syncing the chain.

The process does successfully fail over to the `--fallback-web3provider`, however the output to the console could look more beautiful.

## Has this worked before in a previous version?

Unknown

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

```
/home/ubuntu/go-ethereum/build/bin/geth -goerli -http -syncmode snap
/home/ubuntu/prysm/dist/beacon-chain-v1.3.8-hotfix+6c0942-linux-amd64 --pyrmont --http-web3provider http://localhost:8545 --fallback-web3provider https://goerli.infura.io/v3/9b..d8
```

## üî• Error

```
[2021-05-02 06:40:40] ERROR powchain: Could not connect to powchain endpoint error=eth1 node has not finished syncing yet
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).dialETH1Nodes
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:405
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:361
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:454
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:252
runtime.goexit
	GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1371
could not dial eth1 nodes
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:363
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:454
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:252
runtime.goexit
	GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1371
[2021-05-02 06:40:55]  INFO powchain: Falling back to alternative endpoint: https://goerli.infura.io/***
```

## üåç  Your Environment

```
Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.4.0-72-generic x86_64)
```

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**
```
beacon-chain-v1.3.8-hotfix+6c0942-linux-amd64
```

## Screenshot

Here's how it looks... "the opposite of beautiful":

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2212651/116804840-b56c6000-ab3f-11eb-8b51-a5a456feb2e7.png)
